metadata.title: CVE-2019-8771 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
This issue was addressed with improved iframe sandbox enforcement. Thisissue is fixed in Safari 13.0.1, iOS 13. Maliciously crafted web contentmay violate iframe sandboxing policy.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8771` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.26.1-3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.26.1-3
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.26.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-3').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
